channel.title: Paypal?
channel.description: would people actually pay donations for staff? if so, how much should donation price be? how would i make my server restrict people from getting special items unless their a donator?

item.title: Paypal?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Making money off servers which are supposed to be a learning experience itself is bad.
Learn how to code, not make a business out of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal?
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

[quote=“kicker862, post:1, topic:321906”]would people actually pay donations for staff? if so, how much should donation price be?
how would i make my server restrict people from getting special items unless their a donator?[/quote]

Making donations for staff is very bad. People will think your server is stupid. Don’t make it “Donations”, just make a membership system, and alls they have to do is purchase the membership. Also, if you do wind up doing this idea, don’t just add 1 member shop and expect the members to be happy, add an entire system filled with member features, like commands, places, training features, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal?
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

[quote=“DePredaTe, post:17, topic:321906”]True, my opinion is, get a good staff, then have donators donate for things like, new areas unlocked or certain commands, exp, gold, stuff like that.
When you start selling staff positions. your server will start going down hill.

To licorish55 and relimitos, you really shouldn’t tell people to take their ignorance somewhere else when it’s in fact you that are the ignorant ones.[/quote]

I’ve done that, the donors either like to be “generous” and give out the items thus ruining the economy, or, players do anything to get themselves the privileges that donors receive.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal?
item.dc:creator: @Tomkruz Tomkruz
item.description:
@Tomkruz wrote:

[quote=“wwe4eva, post:6, topic:321906”][quote author=relmitos link=topic=418328.msg3074745#msg3074745 date=1261748692]
You’re not allowed to sell staff positions on your server.
[/quote]

Are you fucking retarded?

You can sell staff postions or whatever you want on your server, but if you do you can’t advertise it on MoparScape.
Read the rules

@Topic - Normally about 10$ for Donator, 20-25$ for Mod and like 50$ Admin. You make your own prices.[/quote]

That’s not a fit mod or admin, you ignorant fool.

@topic

Don’t sell staff spots because obviously you would get unfit staff members.

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:14, topic:321906”][quote author=cows1471 link=topic=418328.msg3074877#msg3074877 date=1261758093]

You cannot ad[quote author=relmitos link=topic=418328.msg3074745#msg3074745 date=1261748692]
You’re not allowed to sell staff positions on your server.

That’s where you’re wrong.

This isn’t 100% correct. As wwe4eva said, you can’t advertise them on MoparScape. He isn’t giving out his IP, so there is really no reason to lock it.
[/quote]

Selling gives JaGeX a law suit
[/quote]

I’m sure Jagex has better things to do than deal with a couple hundred dollars.[/quote]

Read full topic

  2. If you still decide to do this, Make playerrights = 5 donator.

    get them to donate to your paypal name
    make their playerrights 5
    End.
